All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
JavaFX App
AppState
Helper class for application state-related features.
Cast
Represents a cast member in a movie.
Constants
The Constants class provides a set of constant values, configurations, and utility methods for managing supported languages, streaming providers, and generating URLs for movie data from The Movie Database (TMDb) API.
Credits
Represents the credits of a movie, including cast and crew.
Crew
Represents a crew member in a movie.
ErrorModel
Helper class for TMDB-related error handling.
FileDataController
Provides means to read state data from a file and store state data in a file.
Genre
Model class for a movie genre.
GenresResponse
 
GSONTools
A helper class to facilitate all JSON-GSON-POJO-related operations.
HTTPTools
A helper class to facilitate all HTTP-operations.
ImageController
Controller class for the image-related features.
LanguageCodes
Utility class for language code management with subtitles.
Movie
Model class representing a movie.
MovieDataController
Controller that handles all movie data related application logic.
MovieDetails
Represents the details of a movie.
MovieDetailsController
Controller for the movie details view.

FXML Controller class

ProductionCountry

Controller class for handling the profile view of the application.

RecipeViewController

Controller class for managing scene transitions in the application.

Controller class for handling the search view of the application.

Handles all subtitle-related functionalities.

StreamingProvider
 
StreamingResponse
 
SubtitleService
Represents a subtitle service with various attributes such as service details, type, link, etc.
SubtitleService.Audio
Represents an audio with a specific language.
SubtitleService.ImageSet
Represents an image set with different themes.
SubtitleService.Locale
Represents a locale with a specific language.
SubtitleService.Price
Represents a price with amount, currency, and formatted value.
SubtitleService.Service
Represents a service with various attributes such as ID, name, homepage, theme color code, and image set.
SubtitleService.Subtitle
Represents a subtitle with closed captions and locale information.
